title: A Hollywood Detour [ Columbia Screen Gems, 1942]

sources.title: A Hollywood Detour Columbia Screen Gems
sources.description: This cartoon, featuring a running-gag throughout of a John Barrymore caricature being mobbed by fan for an autograph, is a burlesqued tour of Hollywood. The narrator conducts a tourist tour all around the town of Hollywood Boulvevard, Malibu Beach, Santa Anita Race Track, the Brown Derby, and Grauman's Chinese theatre.
